attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition we need 100,000 min signatures to make the gov't act on our behalf.

We are already experiencing grid lock in Barry's West End as a result of people trying to get to The Beaches and attractions of Barry Island.. We simply cannot wait 7 /12 yrs for the new road link to be provided .With an estimated 12,000 new homes planned we must have the infrastructure in place ASAP and before any new development takes place

Many thanks and kind regards from:-

Barrie V Evans Independent Candidate for the Baruc Ward.
Assuring you of my best attention at all times

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Welsh Government and the appropriate local authority, rather than the UK Government.
